# demarcheStat.Exercices

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Ce package contient plusieurs tutoriels autour du modèle linéaire

## Installation

You can install the development version of demarcheStat.Exercices like so:

``` {r, include = TRUE, eval = FALSE}
install.packages('remotes')
remotes::install_github('MarieEtienne/demarcheStat.Exercices)
```

## Exemple

Voici les lignes de commandes pour lancer les tutoriels

```{r example}
library(demarcheStat.Exercices)
## basic example code

```
